actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railway Labor Act to make the findings and orders of a public law board under section 3 of that Act subject to review for any fraud or corruption by a member of the board that relates to the dispute involved, without regard to whether such fraud or corruption was committed before or after the selection of such member to the board.

summary.text: Amends the Railway Labor Act to make the findings and orders of the National Railroad Adjustment Board subject to review for fraud or corruption by a member of the Board that relates to the dispute involved, without regard to whether such fraud or corruption was committed before or after the selection of such member to the Board.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railway Labor Act to make the findings and orders of a public law board under section 3 of that Act subject to review for any fraud or corruption by a member of the board that relates to the dispute involved, without regard to whether such fraud or corruption was committed before or after the selection of such member to the board.
